name: ARPB_TX_ACTIONS
description: This table contains information about actions performed on professional billing transactions.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique key or identification number for a given transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column contains the line count for the information in this table. Each action associated with this transaction is stored on a separate line, one line for each entry.

columns.name: ACTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The action type category ID taken on the transaction.

columns.name: ACTION_DATE
columns.description: The date in which this action is performed.

columns.name: ACTION_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount associated with this action.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The Payor associated with this action.

columns.name: DENIAL_CODE
columns.description: The denial code associated with this action.

columns.name: DENIAL_CODE_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: POST_DATE
columns.description: The date this transaction was posted in calendar format.

columns.name: STMT_DATE
columns.description: The statement date of this transaction.

columns.name: OUT_AMOUNT_BEFORE
columns.description: Outstanding amount of associated transaction before the action is performed.

columns.name: OUT_AMOUNT_AFTER
columns.description: Outstanding amount of the associated transaction after the action is performed.

columns.name: INS_AMOUNT_BEFORE
columns.description: Insurance amount of the associated transaction before the action is performed.

columns.name: INS_AMOUNT_AFTER
columns.description: Insurance amount of the associated transaction after the action is performed.

columns.name: BEFORE_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The Payor of the associated transaction before the action is performed.

columns.name: AFTER_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The Payor of the associated transaction after the action is performed.

columns.name: BEFORE_CVG_ID
columns.description: The coverage of the associated transaction before the action is performed.

columns.name: AFTER_CVG_ID
columns.description: The coverage of the associated transaction after the action is performed.

columns.name: ACTION_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who performed this action.

columns.name: ACTION_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ADJ_CODE_ID
columns.description: If an adjustment is associated with this action, this column contains the adjustment code of that adjustment.

columns.name: RMC_ID
columns.description: The first reason code ID associated with this action.

columns.name: RMC_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: RMC_TWO_ID
columns.description: The second reason codeï¿½ID associated with this action.

columns.name: RMC_TWO_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: RMC_THREE_ID
columns.description: The third reason code ID associated with this action.

columns.name: RMC_THREE_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: RMC_FOUR_ID
columns.description: The fourth reason code ID associated with this action.

columns.name: RMC_FOUR_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: PMT_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The Payor of the payment if this action is associated with a payment.

columns.name: POS_ID
columns.description: Place of Service ID of the transaction.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: Department ID of this transaction.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The procedure ID for the transaction record.

columns.name: LOCATION_ID
columns.description: Location Id for this transaction

columns.name: SERVICE_AREA_ID
columns.description: Service Area ID for this transaction

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the record that maintains the patient's transactions. A patient may use more than one account and an account may contain more than one patient.

columns.name: PRIMARY_DX_ID
columns.description: Primary Diagnosis code for this charge.

columns.name: MODIFIER_ONE
columns.description: The first procedure modifier of the associated transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.

columns.name: MODIFIER_TWO
columns.description: The second procedure modifier of the associated transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.

columns.name: MODIFIER_THREE
columns.description: The third modifier of the associated transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.

columns.name: MODIFIER_FOUR
columns.description: The fourth modifier of the associated transaction. This is the external modifier, as it would be printed on the claim.

columns.name: ASSIGNMENT_BEF_YN
columns.description: This item is a Yes/No flag to determine if the transaction was assigned to insurance before the action on this line for this transaction.

columns.name: ASSIGNMENT_AFTER_YN
columns.description: This item is a Yes/No flag to determine if the transaction was assigned to insurance after the action on this line for this transaction.

columns.name: ACTION_REMIT_CODES
columns.description: This field stores a comma delimited list of external remittance codes for this transaction.

columns.name: ACTION_COMMENT
columns.description: This is the system generated comment for this transaction.

columns.name: ACTION_DATETIME
columns.description: The UTC date and time the action was performed.
